obj.name: The Private Startups Accelerator
obj.caption: private-accelerator.strikingly.com
obj.description: The Private Accelerator is a personal and time-limited mentoring framework for young startup-teams, wishing to succeed executing an immediate market validation, in order to reach a definite answer: â€œdoes anyone actually need my product?â€

data.message: heck, why not? where do i signup?

Start by word of mouth and having people you know download and provide feedback. Then move on to marketing, while starting to work on a version 2. This can have new features or improve existing ones. Until you start generating profits and can get some help, you want to control your scaling. An accelerator program might be right for you now.
